title: Killing The Nightmare

properties.name: description
properties.value: The profit rate assumes 12 kills per hour in 5 man. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your actual kc/hour, your group size and luck.

content:
Killing The Nightmare
Requirements
Skills
  • , , , 90+ , 90+
  • 70+ recommended
Items
  • Melee: Abyssal bludgeon, Scythe of Vitur (on crush), Inquisitor's mace and Avernic defender
    Max strength bonus armour
  • Mage: Trident of the swamp or Sanguinesti staff with an Imbued heart, Harmonised nightmare staff and a Tome of fire
    Occult necklace, Imbued god cape, Ancestral robes
  • Food & Potions: Divine super combat potions, Super restores, Anglerfish or equivalent
  • Other: Rune pouch containing runes for Fire surge (if using the Harmonised nightmare staff)
    • Quest
    Priest in Peril completed to access Morytania
    Other
    King's Ransom to use Piety (strongly recommended)
    Completion of Dragon Slayer II for the Ferocious glove
    Completion of Recipe for Disaster for Barrows gloves (if not using Ferocious glove)
    Completion of Mage Arena II to use imbued God capes
    Results
    ProfitExperience gained
    3,038,176 Varied
    Inputs (424,188)Outputs (3,462,364)
    3 × Divine super combat potion(4) (54,666)6 × Super restore(4) (91,422)60 × Anglerfish (122,220)360 × Zulrah's scales (56,880)360 × Death rune (66,960)360 × Chaos rune (23,040)1,800 × Fire rune (9,000)0.006 × Nightmare staff (207,591)0.004 × Inquisitor's great helm (334,197)0.004 × Inquisitor's hauberk (447,739)0.004 × Inquisitor's plateskirt (512,122)0.002 × Inquisitor's mace (759,722)0.0013 × Eldritch orb (74,672)0.0013 × Volatile orb (219,019)0.0013 × Harmonised orb (747,628)26.4 × Cosmic rune (2,482)15.36 × Nature rune (2,611)24.96 × Death rune (4,643)17.28 × Blood rune (5,478)11.52 × Soul rune (1,740)44.28 × Adamant arrow (974)40.68 × Rune arrow (2,075)15.84 × Yew logs (3,247)5.76 × Magic logs (6,232)12.96 × Gold ore (3,836)30.24 × Coal (5,171)13.92 × Mithril ore (1,601)7.68 × Adamantite ore (8,279)0.96 × Grimy cadantine (1,835)1.92 × Grimy torstol (16,347)2.16 × Uncut emerald (1,214)3.24 × Uncut ruby (3,856)238 × Pure essence (476)2.16 × Shark (1,913)2.88 × Bass (377)1.8 × Prayer potion(3) (13,239)1.8 × Saradomin brew(3) (10,494)1.2 × Zamorak brew(3) (2,324)1.8 × Sanfew serum(3) (53,267)2,517 × Coins (2,517)0.006 × Jar of dreams (3,446)

    The profit rate assumes 12 kills per hour in 5 man. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your actual kc/hour, your group size and luck.

    5-man is a very common group size for killing the Nightmare; however, smaller group sizes are possible and will achieve similar profit. Although the kills per hour will be lower, the chance of an individual party member receiving a drop is greater. All profit from The Nightmare comes from the unique drops, whereby the staff, mace and armour table has a 1/120 chance to roll per kill, and the orb table a 1/600 chance per kill. When either of these tables are rolled, a random party member is chosen to receive the drop, weighted by the total damage dealt by each party member.

    The chance of receiving a drop from either of these tables per kill is 1%, or 0.75% excluding the Nightmare Staff

    Item Weighting (% chance) GE Price

    Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
    It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
    All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
    To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
    If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.
